text: Wings of Hope may refer to: *Wings of Hope (charity), US humanitarian aviation organization established in 1962; uses aircraft to aid people around the world *Wings of Hope (film), 2000 documentary film directed by Werner Herzog, about a woman who survived the crash of LANSA flight 508 *Wings of Hope Children's Charity, an education-oriented charity founded in 2003, and operating India, Malawi, and the United Kingdom
title: Wings of Hope
